bibl.title: "Ho Euripides kai ho Antiphon ho Sophistes".
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XI, 1364 et XV, 1797 (= Pack2 92-93) = Antiphon, fr. 44 Diels-Kranz.

bibl.title: "He archaia sophistike". The Sophistic Movement. Papers read at the First International Symposium on the Sophistic movement. Athens, 27-29 September 1982

bibl.seg: Hadjistefanou C., "Ho Euripides kai ho Antiphon ho Sophistes".
